item.title: Anonymous and Secure

item.title: Technologies inside Webtor.io
item.description: Periodically, my users are interested in what technologies Webtor is based on, whether I use library A or tool B. This time I want to fully answer all questions. To begin with, Webtor has made a 3-year-long journey from a monolithic application living on a dedicated server to the introduction of microservices, containerization, and moving to the Kubernetes (k8s) cluster. Currently, about 10 different services are running in the cluster and 100+ simultaneous jobs are running for downloading torrents and transcoding content.
